001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
004
005/**
006 */
007@Beta
008public class PhantomNoise {
009    public static final PhantomNoise instance2D = new PhantomNoise(MummyNoise.goldenLong[2][0], 2);
010    public static final PhantomNoise instance3D = new PhantomNoise(MummyNoise.goldenLong[3][0], 3);
011    public static final PhantomNoise instance4D = new PhantomNoise(MummyNoise.goldenLong[4][0], 4);
012    public static final PhantomNoise instance5D = new PhantomNoise(MummyNoise.goldenLong[5][0], 5);
013    public static final PhantomNoise instance6D = new PhantomNoise(MummyNoise.goldenLong[6][0], 6);
014    public static final PhantomNoise instance7D = new PhantomNoise(MummyNoise.goldenLong[7][0], 7);
015    public static final PhantomNoise instance8D = new PhantomNoise(MummyNoise.goldenLong[8][0], 8);
016    
017    private final long[] coefficients;
018    public final int dim;
019    private final double inverse;
020    private final double[] working, points;
021    private final double[][] vertices;
022    private final int[] floors;
023    public PhantomNoise() {
024        this(0xFEEDBEEF1337CAFEL, 3);
025    }
026
027    public PhantomNoise(long seed, int dimension) {
028        dim = Math.max(2, dimension);
029        working = new double[dim+1];
030        points = new double[dim+1];
031        vertices = new double[dim+1][dim];
032        double id = -1.0 / dim;
033        vertices[0][0] = 1.0;
034        for (int v = 1; v <= dim; v++) {
035            vertices[v][0] = id;
036        }
037        for (int d = 1; d < dim; d++) {
038            double t = 0.0;
039            for (int i = 0; i < d; i++) {
040                t += vertices[d][i] * vertices[d][i];
041            }
042            vertices[d][d] = Math.sqrt(1.0 - t);
043            t = (id - t) / vertices[d][d];
044            for (int v = d + 1; v <= dim; v++) {
045                vertices[v][d] = t;
046            }
047        }
048        for (int v = 0; v <= dim; v++) {
049            final double theta = NumberTools.atan2(vertices[v][1], vertices[v][0]) + 0.6180339887498949,
050                    dist = Math.sqrt(vertices[v][1] * vertices[v][1] + vertices[v][0] * vertices[v][0]);
051            vertices[v][0] = NumberTools.cos(theta) * dist;
052            vertices[v][1] = NumberTools.sin(theta) * dist;
053        }
054        floors = new int[dim+1];
055        coefficients = new long[dim + 1];
056        for (int i = 0; i <= dim; i++) {
057            coefficients[i] = LightRNG.determine(seed ^ i) | 0x8000000000000001L;
058        }
059        inverse = 1.0 / (dim + 1.0);
060//        printDebugInfo();
061    }
062
063    protected double valueNoise()
064    {
065        final long sd = coefficients[dim] * NumberTools.doubleToMixedIntBits(working[dim]);
066        for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
067            floors[i] = working[i] >= 0.0 ? (int)working[i] : (int)working[i] - 1;
068            working[i] -= floors[i];
069            working[i] *= working[i] * (3.0 - 2.0 * working[i]);
070        }
071        double sum = 0.0, temp;
072        final int limit = 1 << dim;
073        int bit;
074        for (int i = 0; i < limit; i++) {
075            temp = 1.0;
076            long dot = sd;
077            for (int j = 0; j < dim; j++) {
078                bit = (i >>> j & 1);
079                temp *= bit + (1|-bit) * working[j];
080                dot += (floors[j] - bit) * coefficients[j];
081            }
082            sum += temp * (int)(dot ^ dot >>> 23 ^ dot >>> 37);
083        }
084        return (sum * 0x1p-32 + 0.5);
085    }
086
087    public double getNoise(double... args) {
088        for (int v = 0; v <= dim; v++) {
089            points[v] = 0.0;
090            for (int d = 0; d < dim; d++) {
091                points[v] += args[d] * vertices[v][d];
092            }
093        }
094        working[dim] = 0.6180339887498949; // inverse golden ratio; irrational, so its bit representation nears random
095        double result = 0.0, warp = 0.0;
096        for (int i = 0; i <= dim; i++) {
097            for (int j = 0, d = 0; j < dim; j++, d++) {
098                if(d == i) d++;
099                working[j] = points[d];
100            }
101            working[0] += warp;
102            warp = valueNoise();
103            result += warp;
104            working[dim] += -0.423310825130748; // e - pi
105        }
106        result *= inverse;
107        return (result <= 0.5)
108                ? Math.pow(result * 2, dim) - 1.0
109                : Math.pow((result - 1) * 2, dim) * (((dim & 1) << 1) - 1) + 1.0;
110//        for (int i = 1; i < dim; i++) {
111//            result *= result * (3.0 - 2.0 * result);
112//        }
113//        return  (result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0);
114    }
115
116    public double getNoise2D(double x, double y) {
117        points[0] = -0.4161468365471422 * x + 0.9092974268256818 * y;
118        points[1] = -0.5794012529532914 * x + -0.8150424455671962 * y;
119        points[2] = 0.9955480895004332 * x + -0.09425498125848553 * y;
120        working[dim] = Math.PI;
121        double result = 0.0, warp = 0.0;
122        for (int i = 0; i <= dim; i++) {
123            for (int j = 0, d = 0; j < dim; j++, d++) {
124                if(d == i) d++;
125                working[j] = points[d] + warp;
126            }
127            warp = valueNoise();
128            result += warp;
129            working[dim] += Math.E;
130        }
131        result *= inverse;
132        return (result <= 0.5)
133                ? (result * result * 4) - 1.0
134                : ((result - 1) * (result - 1) * -4) + 1.0;
135
136//        result *= result * (3.0 - 2.0 * result);
137//        return  (result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0);
138    }
139    
140    void printDebugInfo(){         
141        System.out.println("PhantomNoise with Dimension " + dim + ":");
142        final String dimNames = "xyzwuvabcdefghijklmnopqrst";
143        for (int v = 0; v <= dim; v++) {
144            System.out.print("points[" + v + "] = ");
145            for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
146                if(vertices[v][i] != 0.0) 
147                {
148                    if(i > 0)
149                        System.out.print(" + ");
150                    if(vertices[v][i] == 1.0)
151                        System.out.print(dimNames.charAt(i % dimNames.length()));
152                    else 
153                        System.out.print(dimNames.charAt(i % dimNames.length()) + " * " + vertices[v][i]);
154                }
155            }
156            System.out.println(';');
157        }
158
159    }
160}
